##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Thanks Alyssa, Thanks, Joel Maligalig support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2944509243-154135#}

Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for bringing this to our attention.

To investigate and resolve the backend issue, we’ll need cPanel access to the site. Additionally, please share the WordPress admin login credentials as well. Once we have both, we’ll be able to properly diagnose what’s causing the admin login error.

Let me know once those details are available, and we’ll get started right away.
